short_description: Passionate about technological innovation, I firmly believe in the power of technology to solve real-world problems in a variety of fields.
description: I'm Charlot DEDJINOU, a professional with a passion for technology. As a developer, data scientist and enthusiast of artificial intelligence and the Internet of Things, I'm committed to creating innovative solutions to real-world challenges. With a diverse range of expertise, I'm determined to push back the boundaries of technology to shape a better future.
